page.title: 11PENTWYN LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: In line with council policy to provide each area with a leisure centre, work started on the 25th of February 1985 (hopefully to be finished by early 1986). Llanrumney has had its own ({ {EASTERN LEISURE CENTRE) }since 1982. { (PENTWYN LEISURE CENTRE)}Sited by the lake,will have a main hall, community room,conditioning/multi Gym room and an External kick about area for football,or three tennis courts. Changing and storage rooms for both internal and external use. Phase 2 will contain a swimming pool,squash courts,bar lounge,cafe and activity area,together with the necessary plant and changing rooms. Local people are not happy because the finance for phase 2 is not available now.They want a swimming pool to be built now.They fear only the first stage will be built.
